sys_remote_update_set.description:
This Update set contains the following:
Page: - Booking [updated the redirection link to display the correct form when clicked]
Widgets: - Sign Up Form [updated the code to validate if all the informatoion is filled in correctly and display error message and block the submisison until complete details are provided] - Menu [updated the redirection on menu options]
Tables and Columns: - New table Event Bookings - New column in Event Bookings, Name - New column in Event Bookings, Email - New column in Event Bookings, Contact - New column in Event Bookings, Date and Time - New column in Event Bookings, Event Type - New column in Event Bookings, Event Venue Details - New column in Event Bookings, Number of Hours - New column in Event Bookings, Preferred Contact Method - New column in Event Bookings, Special Requests
Forms: - Event Booking Form
Variables: - New variable on Event Booking Form, Client Details Label - New variable on Event Booking Form, Name - New variable on Event Booking Form, Email - New variable on Event Booking Form, Contact - New variable on Event Booking Form, Event Details Label - New variable on Event Booking Form, Event Type - New variable on Event Booking Form, Event Venue - New variable on Event Booking Form, Event Venue City - New variable on Event Booking Form, Event Venue Postal Code - New variable on Event Booking Form, Date and Time - New variable on Event Booking Form, Number of Hours - New variable on Event Booking Form, Additional Information Label - New variable on Event Booking Form, Preferrerd Contact Method - New variable on Event Booking Form, Checkbox Phone - New variable on Event Booking Form, Checkbox Text - New variable on Event Booking Form, Checkbox Email - New variable on Event Booking Form, Special Request Text Area
UI Policy: - New UI Polciy added on Event Booking Form to make the fields mandatory for user and some fields read only for users
Scripts and Client Scripts: - New Catalog Client Script added to run on loading of the form and auto populate the fields with the information of the loggedin user - New Catalog Client Script added to run on submission of the form and check if at least one of the checkbox is checked from the preferred contact method - New script added to make the redirection to the home page once the user logs out form the portal
sys_remote_update_set.name: Comp - 231 version 4
